metadata.synopsis: The guard just witnessed a guard jump into the water.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the dock jumperDig into his mindTell him to "wash them off"Dock Observer will AD if he sees it (so distracting him will skip this)

0.speaker: Zealot Arden
0.text: Just... move on, Arden. You didn't see anything.
0.context: NodeContext: said to himself - he's just watched one of his comrades comically executed, not for the first time. Keeping his head down.
